summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Front Street from Maynard Ave. to 4th Ave. South; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 18047 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
